channel.title: Why would we want to discuss an API standard, and what would we want out of this?

item.title: Why would we want to discuss an API standard, and what would we want out of this?
item.dc:creator: stevieflow
item.description:
(notes from call on 26th Sept)

Why would we want to discuss an API standard, and what would we want out of this?

@JohnAdams talks about an “API contract” - in terms of activity (and further down the line. aggregate) calls being constructed in a common way - regardless of the source/base. This then enables the “consumer” to make a choice on which API to utilise

Read full topic
